Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl

Class BillServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.services.impl.BillServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BillService
@Service @Primary public class BillServiceImpl extends Object implements BillService
Implementation of the BillService interface.

This class contains the business logic for managing bills, including methods to add bills and retrieve them based on various criteria such as date, year, and category.
